responsibilities: Research and develop state-of-the-art technology in computer vision and machine learning.
Work with various types of videos and image analysis using cutting-edge deep learning and computer vision techniques.
Consider mobile computing constraints for the optimization of algorithms and machine learning models.
skills: Solid understanding of computer science fundamentals (Data Structure / Algorithm).
Good understanding of machine learning techniques (Artificial Neural Network / SVM / PCA / Linear Regression, etc.).
Ability to grasp basic Computer Vision concepts and techniques.
Experience with TensorFlow, Pytorch, or other deep learning frameworks.
Experience with Android development and familiarity with JNI.
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on research and development in computer vision and machine learning, with a specific emphasis on video and image analysis using deep learning and computer vision techniques. The skills required include a solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, machine learning techniques, and computer vision concepts, along with experience in deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow and Pytorch. There is no mention of working with Generative AI or language models (LLMs) such as GPT or other similar technologies. The focus is more on computer vision and mobile computing constraints rather than natural language processing or generation.
